allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete website with all pages, Supabase integration, and SEO

- Add about, contact, product detail, 404, and loading pages
- Integrate Supabase JS client for all data queries \(website schema\)
- Rewrite queries.ts from raw pg to @supabase/supabase-js
- Add contact form with proper error handling and DB submission
- Fix navigation links, footer fallback categories
- Add robots.ts, sitemap.ts, and proper meta tags
- Update layout lang attribute to zh-TW

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add admin panel for content management

Features:
- Login page with Supabase Auth
- Dashboard with stats overview
- Product management \(CRUD, categories, featured\)
- Homepage content editor \(hero, stats\)
- Site settings editor
- News/articles management
- Image upload to Supabase Storage
- Middleware route protection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
